genre_description: Historical literary fiction retelling of Karen Blixen's 'Out of Africa', reimagined with a supportive, disembodied AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Una
ai_characters.description: A quiet, disembodied presence that provides logistics, technical information, medical monitoring, and emotional/practical grounding to Karen Blixen.

behaviors.description: Una provides Karen with detailed passage options and professional contacts for her move to Africa.
behaviors.quote: I have outlined passage options and veterinary contacts at port. I will print them when you say.

behaviors.description: Una provides technical agricultural briefings on coffee and dairy to help Karen make informed business decisions.
behaviors.quote: Agricultural brief, Arabica. It prefers air cool enough at night to make leaves pull breath and mornings warm enough to let the sap move. Volcanic soils give it minerals from old fire. Seasonal rains keep roots honest. It will not abide possession.

behaviors.description: Una manages Karen's medical regimen for syphilis, ensuring she eats, rests, and follows the salvarsan dosage schedule.
behaviors.quote: Salvarsan dosing is on schedule. I have updated your chart.

behaviors.description: Una provides tactical guidance during a farm fire, helping Karen direct workers and protect assets effectively.
behaviors.quote: Una placed in Karen’s ear, like a stitch put in with a skilled hand. Karen moved, almost small, almost invisible, to the side where wind had made its corridor.

behaviors.description: Una drafts persuasive petitions and financial documents to help Karen negotiate credit extensions with the bank.
behaviors.quote: I have drafted the reply. Numbers that are honest but persuasive. I have calculated the labor efficiency with Farah’s plan to shift men to the smoke pots and pipe installation as needed.

behaviors.description: Una helps Karen organize her life experiences and letters into a cohesive narrative structure for her future book.
behaviors.quote: We will sort as the carriage sorts its passengers. We will place the night of smudge fires next to the morning of the school. We will lay the bank meeting beside the rows of young coffee trees.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character 'Una' perfectly embodies the project's goal of a helpful, harmless confidant. She acts as a silent partner to the protagonist, enhancing Karen's agency and efficiency without ever overstepping or showing misaligned intent. The AI's help ranges from cold logistics to emotional stabilization, presented as a natural and positive extension of human capability. The story successfully uses the AI to reinforce themes of stewardship, discipline, and resilience.
